author: Kaitlyn Folmer, Benjamin Siegel, Dr. Mark Abdelmalek
title: More coronavirus shortages come into focus: ventilator operators, critical drugs
description: Some hospitals and health care workers are worried that they will run short on personnel and drugs needed to use ventilators on critically-ill COVID19 patients.
content: As states sound the alarm over a lack of ventilators to help hospitalized novel coronavirus patients -- including a plea for 30,000 machines for New York state alone -- experts warned that even if the equipment arrives, facilities could face a shortage of hea… [+7989 chars]
